column4: how do i get my system to use my nvidia driver. it says its active, but not in use.
run nvidia-settings and see if IT says its in use.. if it says it is.. then it is. :) theres a bug with the other apps
then its in use.. if it wasent. it would post a message saying its not  in use.
thats a known bug.  saying its not in use when it is..
